quote: We are a way for the cosmos to know itself.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existence.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Space is big. You just won't believe how vastly, hugely, mind-bogglingly big it is.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: To confine our attention to terrestrial matters would be to limit the human spirit.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: We are stardust brought to life, then empowered by the universe to figure itself out.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Matter tells space how to curve. Space tells matter how to move.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: I would say the universe has a purpose. It's not there just somehow by chance.
author: Roger Penrose

quote: The history of astronomy is a history of receding horizons.
author: Edwin Hubble
